ndce_status_2020: Submitted New or Updated NDC with Reduced Total Emissions
ndce_status_2020_label: Submitted New or Updated NDC with Reduced Total Emissions

Niger also commits to reducing its emissions in the energy sector by 11.2% by 2025 and 10.6% by 2030 compared to BAU (unconditional), and by 48% by 2025 and 45% by 2030 compared to BAU (conditional).
